name: UIContextMenuInteractionDelegate
desc: The methods for providing the set of actions to perform on your content, and for customizing the preview of that content.

items.name: func contextMenuInteraction(UIContextMenuInteraction, configurationForMenuAtLocation: CGPoint) -> UIContextMenuConfiguration?
items.desc: Returns the configuration data to use when previewing the content.

items.name: class UIContextMenuConfiguration
items.desc: An object containing the configuration details for the contextual menu.

items.name: func contextMenuInteraction(UIContextMenuInteraction, previewForHighlightingMenuWithConfiguration: UIContextMenuConfiguration) -> UITargetedPreview?
items.desc: Returns the source view to use when animating the appearance of the preview interface.

items.name: func contextMenuInteraction(UIContextMenuInteraction, previewForDismissingMenuWithConfiguration: UIContextMenuConfiguration) -> UITargetedPreview?
items.desc: Returns the destination view to use when animating the appearance of the preview interface.

items.name: func contextMenuInteraction(UIContextMenuInteraction, willPerformPreviewActionForMenuWith: UIContextMenuConfiguration, animator: UIContextMenuInteractionCommitAnimating)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when a preview action begins.

items.name: protocol UIContextMenuInteractionCommitAnimating
items.desc: Methods adopted by system-supplied animator objects when committing preview-related animations.

items.name: func contextMenuInteraction(UIContextMenuInteraction, willDisplayMenuFor: UIContextMenuConfiguration, animator: UIContextMenuInteractionAnimating?)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when a menu display begins.

items.name: func contextMenuInteraction(UIContextMenuInteraction, willEndFor: UIContextMenuConfiguration, animator: UIContextMenuInteractionAnimating?)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when a menu display ends.

items.name: protocol UIContextMenuInteractionAnimating
items.desc: Methods adopted by system-supplied animator objects when interacting with context menus.
